Body: Possible Duplicate:  How to remove device(s) from My Market Account?  I've two devices showing in my Google Play Account, probably because of some old ROM. I want to remove the old entry. I can't install apps to my phone through the website anymore...I can't see any Option in the Google Play Settings.
Title: Unregister device in Google Play

history.Text: I've two devices showing in my Google Play Account, probably because of some old ROM. I want to remove the old entry. I can't install apps to my phone through the website anymore...![The same devices!][1]I can't see any Option in the Google Play Settings.  [1]: http://i.stack.imgur.com/g2nIi.png

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [How to remove device(s) from My Market Account?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/8276/how-to-remove-devices-from-my-market-account)  I've two devices showing in my Google Play Account, probably because of some old ROM. I want to remove the old entry. I can't install apps to my phone through the website anymore...![The same devices!][1]I can't see any Option in the Google Play Settings.
